sys_hub_flow.description: Flow to find NeedIt Tasks older than the number of days in the "auto close application property", close them and open a follow-up task for management.
sys_hub_flow.name: Find and Close Long Overdue NeedIt Tasks
sys_hub_flow.sys_name: Find and Close Long Overdue NeedIt Tasks

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Calculate the auto close overdue date to compare against due dates.

flow.display_value: Find and Close Long Overdue NeedIt Tasks

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Get the Value of the x_58872_needit.autoCloseOverdue Application Property

flow.display_value: Find and Close Long Overdue NeedIt Tasks

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: Update each overdue NeedIt Task with the Handle Overdue NeedIt Tasks subflow.

flow.display_value: Find and Close Long Overdue NeedIt Tasks

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Find open NeedIt Tasks with a Due date older than the number of days set in the x_58872_needit.autoCloseOverdue property.

flow.display_value: Find and Close Long Overdue NeedIt Tasks

sys_hub_sub_flow_instance.comment: Pass the Number of the NeedIt Task record in the Subflow's Reason input.

flow.display_value: Find and Close Long Overdue NeedIt Tasks

sys_element_mapping.value: The NeedIt Task with the Number {{cda69a4a-90ec-477d-9a91-bb0761886950.item.number}} is more then {{adbdf0ce-b76a-40cb-b2a4-8ef980f97c66.property_value}} days overdue!!!
The NeedIt Task with the Number {{cda69a4a-90ec-477d-9a91-bb0761886950.item.number}} is more then {{adbdf0ce-b76a-40cb-b2a4-8ef980f97c66.property_value}}days overdue!!!

sys_hub_trigger_instance.comment: Run the Flow weekly on Friday at 11 pm.

flow.display_value: Find and Close Long Overdue NeedIt Tasks

sys_hub_trigger_instance.name: Weekly
